description:
One of http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Tarou]`s friends, a maid with thick glasses and often sporting a sly mischievous look. She is the head of the Technology Department in the http://anidb.net/ch26309 [Hanaukyou household], and specialises in mechanics and odd inventions, some of them blowing up or otherwise malfunctioning in rather hilarious ways.
Rather oddly enough, she is also an otaku, and even author of the fujoshi manga "http://anidb.net/ch26288 [Oyakata] and http://anidb.net/ch26287 [Sub]" (under the pseudonym 江田島シモーヌ = Etajima Simone).
name: Suzuki Ikuyo
